infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to the camera to take photos for location tags.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select images for location tags.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to place tags on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location to place tags on the map when using the camera.
